channel.title: C IrcBot
channel.description:
I got bored and figured I'd try my luck at making an IRC bot in C. I have ran it with valgrind to attempt to see if I had any memory leaks, according to it, I don't.
I attempted to make the source cross-platform, but I'm more of an idiot so I probably didn't do it right. If you actually take the time to read through the source code and you see something I did wrong or something that I did but there's a better way to do it, please let me know.
I know my "linked list" implementation is probably fuck-all wrong, but it got the job done. If anyone would care to take a look at it and tell me how fucked up it is, I'd be greatly appreciative.
